question: Which among the following is anÂ incorrect statement:
option1: Fundamental Freedoms given by article 19 are not absolute
option2: Article 19 as well as 22 deal with personal liberties
explanation: Fundamental freedoms given by article 19 are not absolute and can be taken away in case of emergency. Article 19 as well as 22 deal with personal liberties. Article 19 guarantees 6 freedoms including speech, assembly, association, profession, residence and movement
